intro: Alectra natalensis, commonly known as Natal starwort, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Apiaceae, which includes carrots and parsley, and is characterized by its small, star-shaped flowers. The plant typically grows in open, sunny habitats such as grasslands and rocky areas. It has slender, hairy stems and small, lance-shaped leaves. Alectra natalensis is often found in the eastern and southern regions of South Africa.
